description: Crystal Collector is a math based game that attempts to have the user add up enough points to match the target score.
Psychic Guessing Game is a game that lets the press keyboard keys in an attempt to match the seceret letter.

Roadtripperzzz is an application that helps users plan a road trip in Oregon. Users enter their name and current location, and Roadtripperzzz give them a destination, directions and a weather report for the destination.
Clicky Game is a React based game that lets the user click on as many images as possible, without clicking the same image twice.
